verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:29
verses.text: Heleb the son of Baanah, a Netophathite, Ittai the son of Ribai out of Gibeah of the children of Benjamin,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:30
verses.text: Benaiah the Pirathonite, Hiddai of the brooks of Gaash,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:31
verses.text: Abi–albon the Arbathite, Azmaveth the Barhumite,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:32
verses.text: Eliahba the Shaalbonite, of the sons of Jashen, Jonathan,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:33
verses.text: Shammah the Hararite, Ahiam the son of Sharar the Hararite,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:34
verses.text: Eliphelet the son of Ahasbai, the son of the Maachathite, Eliam the son of Ahithophel the Gilonite,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:35
verses.text: Hezrai the Carmelite, Paarai the Arbite,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:36
verses.text: Igal the son of Nathan of Zobah, Bani the Gadite,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 23:37
verses.text: Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Beerothite, armourbearer to Joab the son of Zeruiah,
